text: Allah itimadhye bahuksetre tomadera sahayya karechena, ara huna'inera dine'o yakhana tomadera sankhyadhikya tomadera utphulla karechila, kintu ta tomadera labhabana kare ni kono-bhabe'i, ara prthibi bistrta ha'oya sattbe'o tomadera jan'ya hayechila sankirna, tomara phirechile palayanapara haye.
